titleStmt.title: Josephus redivivus: or, Innocencie violated and vindicated. In a sermon preached on the publike day of Thanksgiving, in Wandsworth in Surey by the vicar there. On Thursday May the 24th, 1660.
titleStmt.author: Roberts, Hugh, fl. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Cottrel, for Humphrey Robinson, at the Three Pigeons in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hugh Roberts. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Peterborough Cathedral.

place.placeName: the Three Pigeons in St. Paul's Church-Yard
